external_games.name: Bass Pro Shops: The Hunt - Trophy Showdown

name: Bass Pro Shops: The Hunt - Trophy Showdown
summary: The most realistic hunting experience available, The Hunt: Trophy Showdown brings you to an amazing variety of North American landscapes. Featuring both big and small game, aggressive predators, and customizable weapons, you'll lock horns with some of the world's best hunters as you compete to become a member of the exclusive Bass Pro Shops championship hunting team.
